outcome: Officials uncover evidence linking Halden's death to internal sabotage by a rogue agent.

events.description: A thorough review of system logs identifies unauthorized access by a trusted system admin two days before Halden's death.
Leaked footage confirms the presence of a system admin near Halden's residence, fueling internal sabotage theories.
A former system admin is taken into custody, sparking public outrage and demands for justice.
The Council initiates a comprehensive audit, aiming to identify gaps in internal security protocols.
